tasks.name: Identify Ping Target
tasks.objective: Determine the specific target for the ping operation related to the repository.
actions: Consult with the user to clarify the target for the ping operation.
Research common targets related to the repository.
acceptance: User confirms the target for the ping operation.
risks: Incorrect target may lead to irrelevant results.
mitigations: Validate the target with the user before proceeding.

tasks.name: Define Report Structure
tasks.objective: Establish the format and details required for the repository report.
actions: Discuss with the user the necessary details to include in the report.
Draft a template for the report based on user input.
acceptance: User approves the report structure and content.
risks: Insufficient details may not meet user expectations.
mitigations: Iterate on the report structure based on user feedback.

notes: Focus on clarifying the ping target and report requirements to ensure accurate execution and documentation.
